TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReplyChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
type IReplyChannel = interface interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定义一个接口，通道必须实现该接口，才能成为消息传递终结点之间的请求-回复通信的接收端。

span.span: Defines the interface that a channel must implement to be on the receiving side of a request-reply communication between messaging endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-interface-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-interface-note.md)] 接口包含 方法的同步和异步版本，返回一个 ，用于构造接收的请求的回复。The interface includes synchronous and asynchronous variants of a method return an that can be used to construct replies to received requests. 协定包含接收、试图接收和等待消息功能的同步和异步版本。The contract includes synchronous and asynchronous variants of receive, try-to-receive and wait-for-a-message functionality. 不一定绑定到单个发送方。An is not necessarily bound to a single sender. 其他通道和通道接口提供发送方和回复通道之间的关联，但基协定没有这样的限制。Other channels and channel interfaces provide correlation between the sender and the reply channel, but the base contract makes no such restriction. 提取模式与 一起用于接收消息。The pull model is used with an to receive messages. 此模式的操作方式是先调用 （或其变化版本之一），然后等待消息到达。This model consists of calling (or one of its variants) and then waiting for a message to arrive.

summary.span: 开始用于接收可用请求的异步操作。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to receive an available request.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginReceiveRequest (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginReceiveRequest(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginReceiveRequest(AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
abstract member BeginReceiveRequest : AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: callback
param.span: 委托，接收请求操作完成的异步接收的通知。

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous receive that a request operation completes.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个由应用程序指定的对象，它包含与请求操作的异步接收相关联的状态信息。

span.span: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous receive of a request operation.

summary.span: 开始用于接收可用请求的异步操作，该操作具有默认的超时值。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to receive an available request with a default timeout.

returns.span: 引用请求的异步接收的 。

span.span: The that references the asynchronous reception of the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现调用的标准模式以异步方式。The method implements the standard pattern for invoking asynchronously. 默认超时值为 1 分钟。The default timeout is 1 minute. 如果在用于配置连接的绑定上设置有接收超时值，则会使用该值。If a receive timeout is set on the binding used to configure the connection, then that value is used. 如果要在调用中指定一个显式的超时值，以重写前面提到的其他超时值，应使用 。Use if you want to specify an explicit timeout with the call that overrides these other values. 如果接收的请求消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the request message received is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现调用的标准模式以异步方式。The method implements the standard pattern for invoking asynchronously. 此方法上设置的超时值重写在用于配置连接的绑定上设置的接收超时值。The timeout set on this method overrides a receive timeout set on the binding that is used to configure the connection. 如果接收的请求消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the request message received is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#2)]

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to receive a request message that has a specified time out and state object associated with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method when you need the application processing to continue without waiting. 如果当前线程在回复请求消息时可以被阻塞，或者一直被阻塞到超出超时间隔，则使用同步 方法之一。Use one of the synchronous methods when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message or until the timeout interval is exceeded. 此方法通过回调为操作接收事件处理程序标识的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 直到通道中出现消息时或发生超时时才完成操作。The operation is not complete until either a message becomes available in the channel or the time out occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#5)]

para.span: 如果超出指定的 ，此操作返回 。

span.span: The operation returns if the specified is exceeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前线程在等待请求消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用同步 方法。Use the synchronous method when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a request message to arrive in the queue. 该线程最多被阻塞 `timeout` 指定的时间长度。The thread is blocked up to the specified `timeout`. 此方法通过回调为操作接收事件处理程序标识的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 直到通道中出现请求消息时或发生超时时才完成操作。The operation is not complete until either a request message becomes available in the channel or the time out occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#10)]

The used to construct replies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包装请求消息和用于回复该消息的机制。 encapsulates the request message and a mechanism for replying to that message. 可以被多次调用或并发调用。 can be called multiple times or concurrently. 对于每个接收的请求，仅完成一次 调用。Only one call completes per request received. 如果接收的请求消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the request message received is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 不会导致以任何方式接收或处理请求消息。Calling does not result in a request message being received or processed in any way. 方法主要用于用户要使用事务接收消息的事务处理方案。The method exists primarily for transacted scenarios where the user wants to receive the message using a transaction. 在通常只需要为此使用 时，用户必须创建事务，然后调用 并希望消息在事务超时前到达，但这可能不可行。When using just normally for this, the user must create the transaction, and then call and hope the message arrives before the transaction times out, which may not be possible. 用户可以改为调用 并指定超时值（甚至是无限超时值），接着在消息到达时，可以打开事务，调用 并确信它们能在事务过期前取回消息。Instead, the user can call and specify the time out (even infinite), then when a message arrives they can open the transaction, call and be confident that they can get the message back before the transaction expires. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 该线程最多被阻塞 `timeout` 指定的时间长度。The thread is blocked up to the specified `timeout`. 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#9)]

para.span: 如果超出指定的 ，此操作返回 。

span.span: The operation returns if the specified is exceeded.
